verses.content: Chun, ama chun Pathien biek ina chun a mi ṭhuoi a, chun, kawtkhâr bieng chu ân khi a, hi tieng sîrah tawng ruka lien a na, khing tieng sîra khawm tawng ruka lien bawk a nih; chu chu biekbûk khang tieng ruol a nih.

A lûtna khang tieng chu tawng sâwm a na; lûtna sîr chu sîr khatah tawng nga a na, sîr danga khawm tawng nga bawk a nih; chun, chu dung tieng chu tawng sâwmliin ân khi a, a khang tieng chu tawng sâwmhniin.
Chun, a sûngah a lût a, lûtna kawtkhâr bieng chu tawng hniin ân khi a; a lûtna chu tawng rukin; a lûtna khang tieng chu tawng sariin.
Chun, pindan chu ân khi a, a dung tieng chu tawng sâwmhniin ân khi a, a khang tieng khawm tawng sâwmhni bawkin; chun, ka kuoma chun, “Hi hi hmun inthiengtak chu a nih,” a ta.
Chun, in bang chu ân khi a, tawng ruk a na, sîr tinah a in vêl chun, pindan kêmhai khang tieng chu tawng li pei a na.

A sîr pindanhai chu pathum a na, pakhat chungah a dang, chuong ang peia sâwmthum chena indawt peiin; Inpui banga chun inbûkna nei loa, chutaka chun inbûkna an nei thei lemna dingin, a vêla pindan kêmhai ta ding hrima ruot inpui banga filawrhaia chun an vân bûk a.

Pindan kêmhai chun in chu an vêl sâng deu deu chun an lien deu deu a; in sîr vêl chun a pindan inzâwnpui ang peiin a lien tung pei a; chuong- chun, in vêlin a sûngpui chu a chin deu deu pei a, in sîra chun leilâk a fe tung pei a; chuongchun, mi chun pindan hnuoihnung taka inthawka a chunghnung taka chun pindan lai- lung hraw tlangin a fe a nih.
Chun, in chun a vêlin a rei sukkho a nei ka hmu bawk a; chun, pindan kêmhai lungphûmhai chu luonghmawl tling tawng ruk a nih.
Chun, pindan kêmhai bang sazie chu a puotiengah tawng nga a nih; chun, chutaka la mahla chu pindan kêmhai a sûnga umhai sîr thlâk chu a la nih.
Chun, inpui lungrem le pindan kêmhai inkâr chu sîr tinah a in vêl suokin, tawng sâwmhnia lien a um a.

Chun, pindan kêmhai kawt- khârhai chu chu hmun la âwl tieng- haia chun hawng a na, kawtkhâr pakhat chu hmârtiengah, kawtkhâr dang chu simtiengah; chun, chu hmun la chuonga ngai khang tieng chu tawng nga a nih a vêlin.
Chun, in thlangtieng panga hmun âwl hmaa in chu tawng sâwm- saria lien a na; chun, chu in chu a bang sazie chu a vêlin tawng ngaa sa a nih, a dung tieng chu tawng sâwm- kuo a nih.
Chun, in chu tawng zaa seiin ân khi a; chun, hmun daidana um le a in le, chutaka banghai le chun tawng za chu a nih;
chun, in hmai khang tieng saktieng panga hmun âwla um chu tawng za a nih.

Chun, chu hnungtienga um hmun âwla in seizie chu ân khi a; chutaka a dawdanhai le, sîr khat le sîr khingtienga dawdanhai le chun tawng za a nih; chun, biekin sûngril lem, huon sûng tuollaia tuolpûkhai, a kawtkhâr bienghai, thingphêka in- thuo a na;
a tukver inkhâr zinghai, a sâwng thuma a dawdanhai a vêlin a um a; a inpui kawt lûtnaa inthawk, a vêla thingphêka remin ṭuonga in- thawka tukver chen rem a nih;
chuongchun, tukverhai chu in- thuo an na; kawtkhâr lu chung hmun, in sûngril lem le puo lem, a vêlin a puo le sûngah banghai chun, inkhi thlapa inkhum a nih.
Chun, cherubhai le intûm thinghaia chei a na; intûm thing chu cherub le cherub inkâra chun a um a, chun, cherubhai chun hmai pahni seng an nei a;

chuongchun, sîr khata chun in- tûm thing tieng chun mihriem hmai chu a nghah a, chun, sîr khingtienga chun intûm thing tieng ngha ma chun sakeibaknei tuoi hmai chu a ngha a; in chu a vêlin chuong ang taka siem suok vawng chu a nih.
Hnuoia inthawka kawtkhâr lu chung chen chun cherubhai le intûm thinghaia siem a na; biekin bang chu chuong ang chu a nih.
Biekin thua chun, a kawtkhâr bienghai chu kil li nei an na; chun, hmun inthieng tak hmaa chun, thinga siem mâichâm ang a um a.

Chun, mâichâm chu thing a na, ân sâng tieng chu tawng thum a na, a sei tieng chu tawng hni a nih; a kihai le, a mawnghai le a banghai chu thing ruok a nih; chun, ama chun ka kuom- ah, “Hi hi LALPA hmaa dawkân chu a nih,” a tih a.
Chun, biekin le hmun inthieng tak chun kawtkhâr pahni a nei a.
Kawtkhârhai chun, phêk hran pahni, phêk hni inthlep a nei a, kawtkhâr pakhat ta dingin, phêk hni, kawtkhâr dang ta dingin phêk hni bawk.
Chun, an chunga chun, biekin sûtpui kawtkhârhaia chun cherubhai le intûm thinghai lim siem an na, bang chunghaia siem ang bawk khan; chun, tuolpûk puotieng hmaa chun thingpum lientak tak a um a.
Chun, tukver inkhârhai le, tuol- pûka chun sîr khata le sîr khing- tienga khawm chun intûm thinghai chu an um a; pindan kêmhai le thing- phêk satakhai chu chuong ang chu a nih.
